name: Lazarenko Wilson
description:
Join Lazarenko Wilson as he races through a colourful desert world in this hectic puzzle shooter.

Launch missiles of fire at the falling coloured blocks to clear Laz’s path.
Successive explosive hits raise your combo multiplier for amazing high scores.
Blocks will fall harder, Laz will run faster, the game becomes more challenging.
What’s your highest score in this Sisyphean puzzle-shooter challenge?
